general.title: General

By accessing and using this website, you declare that you have read and understood, and that you agree to the following terms of use and all other legal information available on this website that govern the use of this website (hereinafter collectively referred to as the “Terms of Use”).
general.section-2: If you do not agree to these Terms of Use, you may not access or use the Services. If you do not agree with the Terms of Use, you must immediately stop using this website.
general.section-3: You acknowledge that Social Income may, without prior notice update, modify, or remove the Terms of Use at any time. Changes apply from the moment of publication of the amended Terms of Use on the website. If we make material changes that adversely affect your rights, then we will let you know before the changes come into effect. By continuing to use this website, you explicitly agree to the changes.
